page.title: 14HELPERBY FEAST.
page.content:
Every year, the first Monday after July 11th,the feast comes.There are races and a fancy dress,you get some money even if you do not win. When that finishes the fair starts. There is a dodgem ring and an arcade for the older children and for the younger ones a Bumpy Castle, hook a duck, roll the balls and throwing rings.It is 5op for a go on the dodgems & 2op on the stalls. There used to be a roundabout but it was sold. A hotdog stall sells drinks as well.A big generator on one of the wagons makes enough power for the lights,arcade and dodgems. When the fair has finished it is packed up into wagons and the caravans are put behind the cars. All the long rails have to fit on to the wagons to transport them to the next stop.
Mark Fryer.
